BNC User Reference Guide

<xairaList>

xairaList contains a list of XAIRA parameters of a particular type.
Declaration 
element xairaList
{
   attribute type
   {
      "elementSpec"
    | "keySpec"
    | "regionSpec"
    | "lemmaSpec"
    | "refSpec"
    | "indexSpec"
    | "langSpec"
   },
   xairaItem+
}
Attributes
(In addition to global attributes)
type indicates the function of this part of the specification.
Status: Required
Legal values are:
elementSpec lists and glosses the elements, attributes, and codebooks used in a corpus .
keySpec specifies how items are to be indexed.
regionSpec specifies any predefined regions to be made avalable to the client.
lemmaSpec specifies any lemmatization schemes used.
refSpec specifies how items are to be referenced.
indexSpec specifies any special indexing policies.
langSpec specifies any language-specific rules.
Module module-from-bncxml
